typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadDeleteEquipmentComponents
ReadDeleteEquipmentComponents select(mapColumn(
		{$id} = Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IdSelection
IdSelection derive({$metadata.$model} = 'dtmi:EquipmentComponent;1',
	{$entityDelete} = 'true') ~> ModelDefinition
ModelDefinition sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tmp_EquipmentComponents.v1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToTempRepo
source(output(
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor
ReadDeleteEquipmentComponents select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor exists(ReadTempStatusEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor@Name == StatusColumnSelectionEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor@Name,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor
StatusUpdateEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['EquipmentComponents_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor
source(output(
		EquipmentComponent as string,
		AgingFamily as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusEquipmentComponentsAgingFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadDeleteEquipmentComponents select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionEquipmentComponentsAgingFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusEquipmentComponentsAgingFamiliesStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionEquipmentComponentsAgingFamiliesStatusEditor exists(Name == EquipmentComponent,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateEquipmentComponentsAgingFamiliesStatusEditor
StatusUpdateEquipmentComponentsAgingFamiliesStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['EquipmentComponents_AgingFamilies_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateEquipmentComponentsAgingFamiliesStatusEditor
source(output(
		EquipmentGroup as string,
		EquipmentComponent as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor
ReadDeleteEquipmentComponents select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor exists(Name == EquipmentComponent,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor
StatusUpdateEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['EquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponents_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor
source(output(
		EquipmentComponentSource as string,
		EquipmentComponentTarget as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusEquipmentComponentsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor
ReadDeleteEquipmentComponents select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionEquipmentComponentsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusEquipmentComponentsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionEquipmentComponentsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor exists(Name == EquipmentComponentTarget,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateEquipmentComponentsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor
StatusUpdateEquipmentComponentsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['EquipmentComponents_EquipmentComponents_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateEquipmentComponentsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor
